ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence
Interface SlotRegion

All Superinterfaces:
GViewEventSubject
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSlotRegion, SlotRegionCircular, SlotRegionLinear
public interface SlotRegion
extends GViewEventSubject

Provides access to objects that can layout shapes on certain regions.

Author:
Aaron Petkau
